segments.text: I see the woman standing there, completely oblivious to the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she bunts that dish towel around the plate is almost methodical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s fascinating how focused she is, lost in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, right behind her, the boy is reaching for those cookies, teetering dangerously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a pang of anxiety for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is expanding, slowly creeping toward the woman’s foot, and she has no idea!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I watch the girl, her arm stretched out, waiting for that cookie with such anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a mix of calm and chaos, both within and outside the house.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if these moments ever stress the woman out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so mundane yet filled with unspoken danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
